name: Ultimate Solid
description: The great arcade challenge in physics based platform world. Join the hardcore journey of 200 levels with puzzle elements and claim the title of Ultimate Solid!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32bit Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ 64bit Processor: Intel i5 2,5Ghz+ or equivalent Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: AMD or nVidia with 512MB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Hi! My name's Sasha Zenko. I'm from Belarus.  I am making hardcore letsplay videos handsfree (using only my chin).  I have a program that allows me to assign keyboard controls to mouse movements.  I play your game. It's very good. I like it.  Watch me playing your game without hands here:         YouTubeâ„¢ Video:  Ultimate Solid (Only Mouse)
